monsterDetails.exploreAbilityDescription: - Breaks hidden walls - Moves heavy blocks
monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Aging
skills.description: At the end of its turn, this Monster gains an Age stack.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Bolster
skills.description: Healing actions apply two random Buffs to the target. (Multi-Target-Heals apply one random Buff to each target)

skills.name: Bubble Burst
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 45% (225%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Burst Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) magical damage (water)

skills.name: Bubble Deluge
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party Removes 1 Debuff from all allies

skills.name: Buffing Heal
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also heal the target by 50% of this Monster's Magic.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Channeled Heal
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (400 + 40% Magic + 40% Max Mana) Applies Channel (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Channeling Support
skills.description: Unique Aura: Channel also improves all healing and shielding skills (active and passive) by 15%.

skills.name: Combo Buffing
skills.description: Every Buff action applies one additional random Buff.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Extra Channel
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party gains a non-Channel Buff, 15% chance they also gain Channel.

skills.name: Fire Weakness
skills.description: Fire damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Force of Nature
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) magical damage (earth) Hits all enemies - Heal all allies for (750 + 120% Magic)

skills.name: Full Offense
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery & Glory (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory & Sidekick (Buffs)

skills.name: Full Offense Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Might, Sorcery, Glory, Sidekick & Channel (Buffs)

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Heal target for 4 x (60 + 20% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Charging
skills.description: All healing skills give the healed Monster a Charge stack for each heal. (Active and Passive)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal target for 5 x (70 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal target for 6 x (85 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 4
skills.description: Heal target for 7 x (100 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Heal Lvl 5
skills.description: Heal target for 8 x (130 + 25% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Shield
skills.description: Healing skills (active and passive) also apply a Shield equal to 20% of the amount healed.

skills.name: Healing Wave
skills.description: Heal all for (250 + 80% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: Heal all for 2 x (200 + 50% Magic)

skills.name: Healing Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: Heal all for 3 x (200 + 40% Magic)

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 333)

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Potential
skills.description: Reduces damage taken and increases the damage dealt by 1% for every 20 current Mana. (Calculated before the Mana is spent for an attack)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Syphon
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison (Debuff) damage, each Monster in the party regenerates 5 Mana.

skills.name: Mud Cannon
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 55% (220%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 4
skills.description: 5 x 75% (375%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Mud Cannon Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 80% (480%) magical damage (earth)

skills.name: Multi Bulk
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) and Channel (Buff) can be stacked one additional time. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Poison
skills.description: Aura: Poison (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Overcast
skills.description: Increases the Mana Cost of all attacks, healing and shielding actions by 10% and the power by 15%.

skills.name: Poison Eater
skills.description: 4 x 85% (340%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Eater Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 85% (425%) physical damage (earth) - heal by 50% of the damage dealt Deals an additional 20% hit for every Poison on the target

skills.name: Poison Glands
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply Poison on the attacker.

skills.name: Power Healing
skills.description: Healing actions trigger an additional Heal on the Monster with the lowest Health equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Proliferate
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, trigger an additional 30% damage hit.

skills.name: Protector
skills.description: Aura: All Monsters in the party receive 7.5% less damage.

skills.name: Safecast
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Barrier (Buff) to whole party Applies Channel (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Safecast Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Barrier & Channel (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 60% (240%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 60% (300%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Tackle Lvl 5
skills.description: 7 x 65% (455%) physical damage (neutral) ignores 25% of the target's Defense damage reduction value

skills.name: Taunt
skills.description: When an ally would be attacked, 25% chance to redirect the attack to this Monster. (In PvP, redirecting monster takes 15% increased damage)

skills.name: Tidal Wave
skills.description: 1 x 165% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Tidal Wave Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Tidal Wave Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Toxic Feedback
skills.description: Heal for 5% of Max Health at the start of each turn for each Poison on enemies.

skills.name: Toxin
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Poison.

skills.name: Warlock Healing
skills.description: For every heal applied there is a 10% chance to apply Poison, Weakness or Armor Break on a random enemy.

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Weaken
skills.description: Every hit has a 10% chance to apply Weakness.
